name: Rogue Dice
description:
Rogue Dice is a simple game made as part of IAT 806 at Simon Fraser University.

This game revolves around a simple Attack/Defend/Magic system for a 1v1 combat, with a twist of "investing" dice in moves. Rather than selecting which move to use, the player has a number of dice equal to their level, and invests those dice in the move.

All sounds for this prototype version were found at Freesound.org, and all Images are either programmatic, or found from Game-icons.net.
